source.978cbed2:
spacing = np.linspace(0,10,200)
X,Y = np.meshgrid(spacing,spacing)
Z = (np.sin(X) + np.cos(Y) + 2 * np.arcsinh(X * Y))**2

plt.contour(X,Y,Z, levles=20)
plt.colorbar();
